stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may turn 1 facedown piece of ice in Archives faceup. If you do, resolve 1 subroutine on that ice. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may turn 1 facedown piece of ice in Archives faceup. If you do, resolve 1 subroutine on that ice. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Nanisivik Grid
